version_description:
Fixes:
- Cyrus the necromancer no longer crashes co-op sessions with his dark arts.
- November's Flash Freeze talent "Hypothermia" now works as intended.
- Adjusted audio buffer to be less cpu intensive

Fixes:
- November's "Winter is Here" talent is no longer active even if you haven't learned it yet.
- Fixed a random crash that could happen at the start of a battle in co-op
- Rynn now properly gains a small amount of armor as the party levels u

- Fixed a crash that could occur in co-op at battle start due to the presence of Costello under certain circumstances
- Fixed a crash that could occur in co-op when Odette's life drain strikes a dying target
- Greatly reduced rewards from arena batt

NEW FEATURES:
- There are now 7 difficulty levels in the options menu (up from 5), and the highest setting is now more dangerous than before.
- Text speed can be set to "instant" in the options menu
- A new "extended" interface can be selected fr

- Cyrus' talent "Dark Harvest" now works as intended.
- Fixed an issue causing Cyrus' skeletons to grow stronger in the arena with each passing wave
- Extreme levels of movement speed should no longer produce "wiggling" at a heroes' destination
-
Fixed an issue which could cause a save file to crash on the pre-battle menu if a dialog sequence had been improperly resolved.
